name: Results of AEW
author: Liam Burke

sections.description:
You can now display recent results from All Elite Wrestling events from all shows like Dynamite, Rampage, Collision, PPVs and more.

Give your visitors the ability to quickly browse through results or add the results inside your blog post review of the show.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the results-of-aew directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create a post or page and enter [aewresults count=”5″] and adjust the number to a max of 100
sections.faq:
Any Upcoming Features?

Adding the ability to return results by show, also add a wrestler to be able to display a set number of their matches return their win/loss record.

short_description: Display a custom number of recent results from All Elite Wrestling matches.
